txt.en:
This note reads:

'Seek out any duvodiad and drive them from this place. There are two encampments... capture as many of them as possible, kill the rest.

Trehéarn'

Haul at Echad Naeglanc will be interested in this note.
'I should have known. Trehéarn of the Dievlig is a vicious monster.'
This note details the order to attack Echad Naeglanc.
Bring the note to Haul at Echad Naeglanc in the Bonevales
Haul is at Echad Naeglanc in the Bonevales.\n\nYou should bring the note to Haul at once.
